articles.title: Xpeng extends 10-year warranty offer for Model Y rival
articles.author: Jordan Mulach
articles.summary: Xpeng Australia is offering a complimentary 10-year, 220,000km vehicle warranty, including 10 years of battery coverage, for buyers who order the Xpeng G6 between February 1 and June 30. This promotion extends the standard warranty and also waives the cost of the G6's first service.

articles.title: Customer co-creation: The time is now
articles.author: Lior Arussy
articles.summary: Jaquet Droz launched 'JD 8.0: A Disruptive Legacy', a strategy focusing on co-creating unique watch pieces in partnership with customers. The company dismantled its retailer network and built collaboration studios to enable direct interaction with clients during the design and production of timepieces. This approach has led to unique creations such as the Tourbillon Skelet Red Gold—Bon Jovi and The Rolling Stones Automaton—Exile on Main Street.

articles.title: Beauty fans rave over supermarket's own-brand shampoo that leaves hair ‘lightweight & silky soft'
articles.author: Digital Fabulous Editor
articles.summary: Marks and Spencer (M&S) has launched a new line of £3 sulphate and silicon-free, vegan-friendly shampoos and conditioners.  The products come in orchid and waterlily (volumising) and sea salt and green bergamot (nourishing) versions, promising to rebalance the scalp and provide weightless hydration. Initial reviews on social media are highly positive, with users praising the products for leaving hair lightweight, moisturized, and soft.

articles.title: Beauty fans rave over supermarket's own-brand shampoo that leaves hair ‘lightweight & silky soft'
articles.author: Katy Pagan
articles.summary: Marks and Spencer (M&S) has launched a new range of £3 sulphate and silicon-free, vegan-friendly shampoo and conditioners. The product line includes orchid and waterlily volumizing and nourishing sea salt and green bergamot options. Customers have praised the products for making hair lightweight, moisturized, and soft.

articles.title: 5 Best Mini Portable Projectors in Australia for 2025
articles.author: Harriet Amurao
articles.summary: The article introduces and reviews several mini projectors, including the XuanPad Mini Projector with 1080p 4K support and access to 8,000 apps, the WiMiUs Portable Mini Projector offering 1080p resolution and Bluetooth connectivity, the XGIMI MoGo 3 Pro with Google TV integration and Harman/Kardon speakers, and the PUTRIMS Mini Projector with a rotatable stand and 1080p Full HD resolution.  These projectors offer portability and various features suitable for home cinema experiences and gaming.

articles.title: Using the hearing aid feature in AirPods Pro 2 w/o a compatible phone February 24, 2025 2:43 PM Subscribe
articles.summary: Apple's AirPods Pro 2 now offers hearing aid functionality in the UK. Users are exploring the feature's setup process, specifically regarding compatibility with older phone models.

articles.title: Kmart's new $29 cleaning gadget solves a problem all Aussies face: 'I can't believe how well it works'
articles.author: BELINDA CLEARY
articles.summary: Kmart customers are enthusiastic about the updated $29 rechargeable window vacuum cleaner, which features improvements like a larger water capacity and new attachments. Kmart also launched a $79 cordless spot cleaner which is useful to clean carpets and rugs, car interiors, stairs, fabric upholstery and more. These new products have received positive customer feedback for their effectiveness and affordability.

articles.title: This $7 slime-like gel pulls grime from every crevice of your car like a magnet
articles.summary: Pulidiki Cleaning Gel, priced at $7, is a new cleaning product designed to remove dirt and debris from hard-to-reach places in car interiors and other devices. The reusable gel adheres to dust without leaving residue and is receiving positive feedback from Amazon customers who praise its effectiveness in cleaning crevices and tight spaces.

articles.title: The Subtle Science of Making Your Brand Memorable Through Merchandise
articles.author: PR News
articles.summary: Totally Branded is an innovative company that elevates its public image by harnessing the potential of unique merchandise. Thoughtfully designed merchandise transforms an abstract brand idea into tangible experiences, forging a lasting bond between the brand and its audience. Companies can integrate branded merchandise into their overall marketing strategy to enhance every facet of their campaign.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy A15 Amazon India
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Samsung introduced an affordable 5G smartphone. The smartphone features long-term software support and impressive features.

articles.summary: Samsung is launching an affordable 5G smartphone. The new smartphone features long-term software support and impressive features, targeting budget-conscious consumers.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy A15 display quality
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Samsung is launching an affordable 5G smartphone. The new smartphone boasts impressive features and long-term software support.

articles.title: SharkBeauty hair dryer brush is 20% off at Walmart
articles.author: Cailey Lindberg
articles.summary: SharkBeauty is offering a discounted SmoothStyle Heated Comb & Blow Dryer Brush, utilizing lower heat and nylon bristles for hair styling. Elizabeth Arden has also launched a new line of skincare products, including hand cream, body oil, and lip balm, at Walmart, with limited edition items also available.

articles.title: Meghan Markle's brand won't launch 'until months' after Netflix show, insiders claim
articles.author: Sophia Papamavroudi
articles.summary: Meghan Markle is launching a new lifestyle brand called 'As Ever,' with products expected to be available a few months after the launch of her Netflix show, 'With Love, Meghan,' which airs on March 4. The 'As Ever' products are likely to be sold online.

articles.title: Anthropic's new Claude model can think both fast and slow
articles.author: Igor Bonifacic
articles.summary: Anthropic introduced Claude 3.7 Sonnet, a "hybrid reasoning model" available across all Claude plans, including the free tier. They also launched Claude Code, an agentic tool for coding tasks that can read, edit, write, and run tests, and even push commits to GitHub, currently in limited research preview.

articles.title: The Best Grooming Routine Includes This Easy-to-Use Beard Shampoo
articles.author: Mary Honkus
articles.summary: Blu Atlas is promoting their beard shampoo and conditioner. The Blu Atlas shampoo is designed to clean beards, enhance shine and softness, and control frizz. Users report that the shampoo and conditioner soften beard hair and eliminate beard itch.

articles.title: The best Dyson cordless stick vacuums for 2025, tested and reviewed
articles.summary: The article reviews and compares various Dyson cordless stick vacuums, including the V8, V11, V15 Detect, and Gen5detect models, highlighting their features, run times, bin capacities, and suction power. Dyson's cordless stick vacuums are known for packing significant suction power into one lightweight, agile frame and brush. The Dyson Gen5 (Detect) was the most powerful Dyson vacuum at the time of publication.

articles.title: Dr. Martens Buzz Collection, Reviewed By 4 Elite Daily Editors
articles.summary: Dr. Martens launched a new shoe called 'Buzz' featuring a sporty, streetwear aesthetic with a chunky platform sole. The Buzz shoe is available in a variety of textures and colorways, designed for comfort and confidence. Elite Daily editors have test-driven the new Dr. Martens Buzz.

articles.title: Brookwood's eighth graders showcase innovative solutions in Design Thinking Class
articles.author: Robin Richardson
articles.summary: Brookwood School's eighth-grade students showcased innovative solutions in Design Thinking class. The projects included 'Square Ball,' a dynamic fusion of gaga ball and four square; 'Better Days,' a clothing line designed for versatility; and 'Notifi,' an AI-powered device aimed at helping users manage their daily routines. Students presented these prototypes to Brookwood's Leadership Team.

articles.title: Hotdeals Launches New Blog Page – ‘More Saving Tips & Real Coupon Advice From Hotdeals'
articles.author: Hot Deals
articles.summary: Hotdeals launched a new blog page, 'More Saving Tips & Real Coupon Advice From Hotdeals,' to empower consumers with actionable strategies, expert insights, and insider knowledge for smarter shopping. The blog will feature in-depth articles, guides, and curated tips covering various topics like coupon strategies, seasonal sales, and retailer-specific advice.

articles.title: This book light is a night reader's dream come true — and it's down to $12
articles.summary: Glocusent Book Light is a compact, adjustable reading light featuring five brightness levels and three color modes: Amber, Breeze, and Precise. It offers up to 80 hours of light, rechargeable via USB and currently available on sale, making it a helpful gadget for nighttime readers.

articles.title: Ask Jerry: Why aren't smartphones getting better?
articles.author: Jerry Hildenbrand
articles.summary: The article discusses potential features and differences in upcoming smartphones, such as the Galaxy S25, Pixel 9, iPhone 16, and OnePlus 13, highlighting improvements in camera, video, hardware, and software. It also mentions innovative phone designs like the Techno Phantom Ultimate 2 and Motorola Razr Plus 2024 and describes phone makers innovations like thinner designs and larger batteries.

articles.title: Supporting Small Businesses: Local Baby Companies
articles.author: Monique Seleen
articles.summary: Alexander Layne Pajamas, a mother-daughter business based in Gilbert, creates eco-friendly sleepwear using bamboo material. Olive Spa Baby Products, started by Brenda Rea, introduces a new baby line including Baby Bum Butter, Gentle Baby Oil, Gentle Baby Powder, Gentle Baby Lotion Stick, Gentle Baby Foaming Wash, Gentle Baby Olive Oil Soap and Gentle Baby Laundry Soap, all made with olive oil and other natural ingredients.

articles.title: Anthropic launches advanced AI hybrid reasoning model
articles.author: Reuters
articles.summary: Anthropic has launched the Claude 3.7 Sonnet AI model, an advanced model available on all Claude plans, that combines multiple reasoning approaches to solve complex problems, and also a limited-release preview of Claude Code, an agentic coding tool. The Claude 3.7 Sonnet model is priced at $3 per million input tokens and $15 per million output tokens.

articles.title: Swig Prepares to Open New Location in Spring Hill
articles.author: Donna Vissman
articles.summary: Swig, a specialty soda beverage company, is expanding into Middle Tennessee. A location in Brentwood is currently open with a grand opening celebration scheduled for February 27, 2025. Plans are also underway for a Spring Hill store at 4821 Main Street, featuring a drive-thru service.

articles.title: Best ABC Secret Sales products to keep you comfy and cozy, with exclusive discounts up to 54% off
articles.author: ABC Secret Sales Staff
articles.summary: The Comfy introduces a wearable blanket available for kids and adults. Cozy Earth promotes their comfortable and elegant sleepwear line. Yenta + Posha are offering No-Show Liner Socks, while Spongelle provides all-in-one beauty treatment body wash infused buffers. Saltopia features their rich and creamy Italian hot chocolate.

articles.title: Next selling pack of two spring dresses for £25 that are 'great for holiday'
articles.author: Emily Sleight
articles.summary: Next has launched a new double pack of midi dresses for £25. The dresses, made from soft and stretchy cotton, feature a polo shirt design with an open neck and come in plain navy and striped navy options. Customer reviews highlight the comfortable fit and versatility of the dresses.

articles.title: Save £150 on Hoover vacuum that's 'twice as powerful' as Shark in half price sale
articles.author: Jake Hackney
articles.summary: Hoover is offering an exclusive deal on their vacuum cleaner which features a battery life of over 30 minutes, 'Turbo Boost' function and the ability to switch between hard floor and carpet modes.  The purchase comes with a five-year warranty. Competitor Shark is offering their device at a discounted price of £189.99.

articles.title: Amazon has the GE smart indoor smoker back on sale for its cheapest price ever ...
articles.author: Lehigh Valley
articles.summary: GE offers the Smart Indoor Smoker. The GE Smart Indoor Smoker aims to provide a smokey barbecue experience without weather interference.

articles.title: Ninja's Foodi Air Fryer praised as it 'speeds up cooking' and 'has no negatives'
articles.author: Faith Richardson
articles.summary: Ninja has introduced the Foodi Dual Zone Digital Air Fryer, which allows users to cook two different foods simultaneously using its dual-zone technology. It offers four cooking functions: roast, air fry, reheat, and crisp, with a 7.6L capacity. The Ninja Foodi air fryer parts are removable, non-stick and dishwasher-safe.

articles.title: Novatech Dramatically Expands Residential Doorglass Options at IBS 2025
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Novatech is launching 14 new doorglass options at IBS 2025. The launch also includes new luxury door accents and an innovative approach to harmonizing the design of front and garage doors.

articles.title: Novatech Dramatically Expands Residential Doorglass Options at IBS 2025
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Novatech has launched 14 new doorglass options at IBS 2025, featuring classic, contemporary, and transitional designs. The new doorglass options explore current trends, including biophilic designs, use of sustainable materials, and curvilinear forms which visually suggest organic shapes. Novatech also introduces new luxury door accents and an approach to harmonize front and garage doors.

articles.title: Novatech Dramatically Expands Residential Doorglass Options at IBS 2025
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Novatech is launching 14 new doorglass options at IBS 2025, featuring classic, contemporary, and transitional designs, including biophilic and sustainable options.  Novatech also introduces new luxury door accents and a method to harmonize front and garage door designs with Garaga.

articles.title: Your personal robo-butler: Futuristic humanoid can boil the kettle, do the hoovering and fold your laundry - but fans claim it belong in a HORROR movie
articles.author: JONATHAN CHADWICK
articles.summary: Norwegian robotics company 1X, backed by OpenAI, has unveiled NEO Gamma, an AI-controlled humanoid robot designed for home assistance. Currently a prototype, NEO Gamma is capable of performing various household chores and is intended to offer companionship. The company aims to integrate these robots into homes for testing, with the goal of achieving autonomous operation in the future.

articles.title: This 2-In-1 Cordless Vacuum And Mop Is 40% Off — But Only For A Limited Time
articles.author: Kevin Cortez
articles.summary: Shark introduced the VacMop, a cordless 2-in-1 vacuum and mop device designed for cleaning hard floors. It features disposable cleaning pads, powerful suction, and a lightweight design for easy maneuverability. The VacMop aims to provide a convenient and efficient cleaning solution, eliminating the need for traditional brooms, mops, and corded vacuums.

articles.title: You Are Completely Unprepared for What This Humanoid Servant Robot Looks Like
articles.author: Victor Tangermann
articles.summary: Norwegian robotics startup 1X has unveiled its new humanoid robot, Neo Gamma, designed for household tasks. The company aims to integrate the robot into homes and is working towards making it commercially available, with internal home testing as a first step. 1X received funding from OpenAI for development of new Robot.

articles.title: Flexport releases onslaught of AI tools in a move inspired by 'Founder Mode
articles.author: Techcrunch
articles.summary: Flexport is introducing a suite of new products and features leveraging AI technology. These announcements are planned as part of a semi-annual product release strategy. The company is a freight forwarding and logistics provider.

articles.title: Flexport releases onslaught of AI tools in a move inspired by ‘Founder Mode'
articles.author: News Feed Editor
articles.summary: Flexport is launching a suite of over 20 new products, many powered by AI from OpenAI, Anthropic, and AWS. These include Flexport Intelligence, which uses natural language prompts to provide shipment information, and Control Tower, offering real-time visibility and control over logistics networks.

articles.title: Company that put soap in soap operas launching daytime drama centered on Black family
articles.author: Tribune News
articles.summary: Procter & Gamble is re-entering the soap opera world with 'Beyond the Gates' on CBS. The show will feature the company's products, such as Tide detergent and Febreze air freshener, integrated into the storyline, marking a new approach to product placement and advertising for P&G. This initiative represents a return to content production for P&G, focusing on embedding products authentically within the show's narrative.

articles.title: How to create an effective customer experience strategy
articles.author: Taher Batterywala
articles.summary: Verizon utilizes generative AI to enhance its customer service operations. This implementation aimed to improve customer retention and reduce churn by addressing issues faster, offering personalized support, and saving about seven minutes per store visit. The approach was expected to help Verizon retain 100,000 customers in 2024.

articles.title: Xbox Controller Refresh Detailed in Latest xCloud Files
articles.author: Gaming Bolt
articles.summary: Microsoft is potentially developing a new Xbox controller. The new controller might include features similar to the PS5's DualSense controller.

articles.title: Meghan Markle expands business and releases new photo with daughter Lilibet at U.S. brand launch
articles.author: Bruna
articles.summary: Meghan Markle launched her new home products brand, 'As Ever,' featuring items for cooking, gardening, and home decor. The brand's first product was a homemade jam initially distributed to influencers. A strategic partnership with Netflix will integrate 'As Ever' into exclusive content, expanding its reach and offering a seamless experience between lifestyle products and digital media.

articles.title: SONIC Introduces the New Strawberry Mangonada Slush – a Sweet Treat with a Tangy Tajín Kick
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: SONIC Drive-In is launching the new Strawberry Mangonada Slush, a limited-time beverage inspired by the traditional Mexican mangonada treat and featuring Tajín Clásico Chili Lime seasoning. It will be available nationwide starting March 3rd, with early access for SONIC App users.

articles.title: YEEDI S14 PLUS: Unleashing the Future of Clean with Innovative OZMO Roller Mopping Technology
articles.author: YEEDI Technology
articles.summary: YEEDI launched its flagship robot vacuum, the YEEDI S14 PLUS, featuring OZMO Roller Instant Self-Washing Mopping Technology developed with Tineco. The company is offering a limited-time discount to celebrate the launch.

articles.title: Hyundai Pakistan launches the exclusive SONATA N Line
articles.author: ADVERTISEMENT
articles.summary: Hyundai Pakistan launched the Sonata N Line sedan at an event on January 12, 2025. The Sonata N Line features a Smart stream 2.5 Turbo GDI engine, 8-speed dual-clutch transmission, and Hyundai SmartSense ADAS features. Bookings are open at Hyundai dealerships nationwide at an ex-factory price of Rs15,890,000.

articles.title: "We've never seen a colour like this in fresh produce ranges"
articles.summary: Genesis Fresh introduced a new orange variety, Onix, characterized by its deep burgundy color, juicy pigmented flesh, high yield, and rich flavor. Guido Fruit is importing and distributing the Onix oranges, reporting strong initial sales and positive customer feedback. The Onix orange also won the Innovation Award at Fruit Logistica.

articles.title: Marks & Spencer's new 'wow factor' £40 halter neck summer dress that's 'comfy to travel in'
articles.author: Zoe Chamberlain
articles.summary: Marks & Spencer (M&S) has introduced a new saffron yellow halter neck dress priced at £39.50. Initial reviews indicate positive customer experiences with the product.

articles.title: Just 46 Very Nice Things For Your Kitchen
articles.author: Jenae Sitzes
articles.summary: The article showcases a variety of kitchen and home products available from brands like Amazon, Our Place, Brightland, Food52, Karibe, and Etsy. These products range from cookware and utensils to storage solutions and decorative items, emphasizing innovative features and unique designs and quality. New products like Balmuda toaster ,Estelle Colored Glass and macrame hanging basket is handcrafted by Knapps Knots are introduced.

articles.title: Procter & Gamble Works Up New Lather for Soap Operas With ‘Beyond the Gates'
articles.author: Brian Steinberg
articles.summary: Procter & Gamble is launching a new soap opera, 'Beyond the Gates,' in partnership with CBS and the NAACP. The show will feature integrated marketing for P&G products like Tide detergent and Febreze air freshener to engage with viewers. P&G aims to authentically showcase its products within the show's storylines.

articles.title: Ncell launches flash sale on Khalti with bonus data and gifts
articles.summary: Ncell has introduced a flash sale offer in collaboration with Khalti, providing customers with bonus data, talk time, and potential gifts every Sunday until March 22. Customers purchasing selected Ncell packs, including Always On, Home and Away, and the 999 Unlimited pack, through Khalti are eligible for these bonuses.

articles.title: RoomPriceGenie: $75 Million Raised For For Revenue Management Platform For Independent Hotels And Groups
articles.author: Amit Chowdhry
articles.summary: RoomPriceGenie, a revenue management system provider, received a $75 million investment from Five Elms Capital to enhance its platform and expand internationally. As part of this growth, RoomPriceGenie launched its OpenAPI, which allows PMS providers to integrate the solution seamlessly.

articles.title: NEW 'SKS' LUXURY APPLIANCE BRAND DEBUTS AT KBIS, UNVEILING NEW LOOK FOR SIGNATURE KITCHEN SUITE
articles.author: LG Electronics
articles.summary: SKS brand was launched at the 2025 Kitchen and Bath Industry Show (KBIS). The launch marks a significant milestone in the brand's evolution and drives innovation in the luxury appliance market with new product innovations blending precision and powerful performance.

articles.title: Amazon offering £70 off 'amazing' vacuum cleaner that 'rivals Shark and Dyson'
articles.author: Catherine Addison-Swan
articles.summary: Amazon lists a vacuum cleaner with features like self-standing ability and a crevice tool. Customer reviews compare its performance and value to brands like Shark, Dyson, and Vax, highlighting its suction power and battery life as comparable to or even exceeding those of more expensive models.

articles.title: WATCH: Meet the gym bro of the future, ‘Protoclone'—This humanoid robot has 1,000 muscle fibres
articles.author: Livemint
articles.summary: Clone Robotics has introduced 'Protoclone', a humanoid robot prototype designed to mimic human musculoskeletal functions. The robot features over 200 degrees of freedom, 1,000 artificial muscle fibers, and 500 integrated sensors. Protoclone is equipped with cameras and precision sensors and is planned to be available for preorder later this year.

articles.title: Here comes supercharged Amazon Alexa AI for investors
articles.author: Brian Sozzi
articles.summary: Amazon is expected to unveil a new generative AI assistant called Rufus at an upcoming event. The company is considering a monthly subscription for access to Rufus, which could become a significant revenue stream. This launch aims to enhance Alexa's intelligence with generative AI technologies and potentially challenge Apple's Siri.

articles.title: ‘Eternal Strands' debuts as a promising first effort from Yellow Brick Games
articles.author: Ulises Duenas
articles.summary: Yellow Brick Games debuted 'Eternal Strands'. The game's gameplay is unique.

articles.title: Kia Syros crosses 20,000 bookings mark, top-end variants lead demand. Check details
articles.author: Ht Auto Desk
articles.summary: Kia launched the Kia Syros on February 1st, 2025, with deliveries starting mid-February. The Syros is priced between ₹ 9 lakh and ₹ 17 lakh and is available in six variants with petrol and diesel engine options, featuring a 30-inch panoramic dual-screen, ventilated seats, and ADAS level 2 technology. Bookings have crossed 20,000 since January 3, 2025, with a preference towards petrol engines and top variants.

articles.title: Primark shoppers convinced £4 powder is just like designer product sold for £52
articles.author: Danielle Kate Wroe
articles.summary: Primark has launched a new, affordable makeup powder product. The product is cherry-scented, includes a powder puff, and features four colors. Initial reviews suggest it provides smooth coverage and brightness, though some users noted that you need to buff it out to ensure even coverage.

articles.title: This dinky hair dryer blew me away with its powerful airflow, scalp-friendly modes, and super-cute design
articles.author: Ruth Hamilton
articles.summary: Laifen has launched the Laifen Mini, a lightweight and portable hair dryer with a minimalist design. It features standard temperature and windspeed options, alongside advanced modes like a hot-to-cold cycling mode and a child mode with lower pressure. The Laifen Mini also includes a carry bag and is designed for both travel and everyday use.

articles.title: Cuisinart's Soft Serve Ice Cream Maker is cheaper than the Ninja Creami Swirl, but is it as cool?
articles.author: Cat Ellis
articles.summary: Cuisinart introduces the Soft Serve Ice Cream Maker as a budget-friendly alternative to the Ninja Creami Swirl. This machine allows users to create smooth and creamy ice cream, offering an excellent recipe book to get started. The ice cream maker needs close monitoring to ensure correct consistency due to its gravity-dependent dispenser.

articles.title: Qualcomm Snapdragon X comes to India, promises AI PCs with multi-day battery life
articles.summary: Qualcomm has introduced its Snapdragon X platform for laptops in India, emphasizing AI features and battery life. Asus and Lenovo are partnering to offer laptops using this platform. Consequently, Asus has launched the Vivobook 16 and Zenbook A14, now available for pre-order, incorporating the Snapdragon X platform.

articles.title: Sharjah CP attends launch of ‘Aqari' Real Estate Services Platform
articles.author: Sharjah 24
articles.summary: Sharjah launched Aqari, a new digital platform designed to streamline real estate services. Aqari offers features such as digital certificates and a streamlined tenancy contract authentication process, reducing the steps from seven to three. The platform already has a high customer satisfaction rate, with a significant number of real estate units added and users trained during its pilot phase.

articles.title: These Convenient Handbags Solve Problems You Didn't Know You Had
articles.author: Griffin Wynne
articles.summary: Baggu introduced a versatile crescent bag with an adjustable strap. Lululemon offers a cheaper crossbody belt bag alternative. The TikTok viral Bogg bag, resembling a Croc in tote form, is waterproof and accessorizable. CalPak's water bottle sling features an expandable, insulated pocket. L.L. Bean's Boat & Tote is a durable canvas bag for various uses. Baggallini's crossbody includes an RFID-protected wristlet for security. A leather tote diaper bag caters to new parents with insulated pockets. A personalized leather laptop bag offers style and functionality for commuters. Lastly, an insulated faux-leather crossbody cooler bag keeps drinks cold, demonstrating diverse new product offerings.

articles.title: 38 Products Future You Will Be So Glad You Bought At The Start Of The Year
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: This content highlights the launch of various new products across multiple sectors. It includes Gold Bond's firming neck and chest cream, Coop Home Goods pillow with adjustable memory foam filling, Good Molecules Yerba Mate Wake Up Eye Gel, Sol De Janeiro Bum Bum Cream, and Cosrx repairing essence. It also features cleaning solutions like Pink Miracle tennis shoe cleaner and Folex Carpet Spot Remover, alongside household items such as a rotating utensil holder and a mountable styling station.

articles.title: B&M shoppers desperate to buy £4 drink 'just the same' as Prime
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: B&M is now selling Mās+ by Messi, a new hydration drink created by Lionel Messi, priced at £4 per 500ml bottle. The drink is available in Berry Copa Crush, Miami Punch, Orange D'Or, and Limon Lime League flavors and is being compared to Prime Hydration by customers.

articles.title: China's wedding industry embraces AI
articles.summary: Hunliji, a Chinese wedding service platform, is introducing AI-powered tools to enhance wedding planning. These include features like virtual dress fittings, a 24/7 AI sales assistant, and a magic mirror for instant photo editing, aiming to provide innovative solutions for couples and businesses in the wedding industry.

articles.title: How cuisines from Bobby Flay, Michael Symon, other famous chefs are coming to South Jersey
articles.author: Celeste E. Whittaker
articles.summary: Wonder, a food hall and delivery service, is expanding to Cherry Hill and Mount Laurel this spring, offering a curated super app for mealtime. They partner with renowned chefs and restaurants to deliver a variety of cuisines, allowing customers to order from multiple restaurants in one order. Wonder also acquired Blue Apron and Grubhub to enhance its meal kit and delivery capabilities.

articles.title: Alibaba's Qwen Teases Major Announcement Tonight, Chinese AI Company Likely Launching New AI Model; Check Details
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: Alibaba's Qwen is launching a new AI model. The company has announced that qwen.ai now belongs to them, and users can access Qwen chat through chat.qwen.ai. An image of the Qwen Chat interface was also shared.

articles.title: Car wash looks to clean up by replacing these dead businesses on key Tinton Falls corner
articles.author: David P. Willis
articles.summary: Spark Car Wash is planning to open a new car wash location in Tinton Falls, NJ, in the first half of 2026. The new location will feature a 5,900-square-foot facility with a high-tech car wash tunnel and 23 self-vacuuming spaces, offering customers a comprehensive car cleaning experience. Spark Car Wash also offers memberships for unlimited car washes.

articles.title: Spark Car Wash coming to the Jersey Shore
articles.summary: Spark Car Wash is expanding its operations by opening new locations, including one at 2 Haines Street in Lacey and another in Tinton Falls where a former Burger King and Evolve Fitness used to be.

articles.title: The best Chromebook you can buy in 2025
articles.author: Nathan Ingraham
articles.summary: Google introduced the Chromebook Plus initiative, setting minimum hardware and software requirements for Chromebooks, including processors, RAM, storage, webcam, and screen resolution. This initiative aims to provide consistent performance and features, such as AI-powered tools like 'help me write' and the Google Photos Magic Editor. Every Chromebook in top picks comes with a full year of the Google One AI Premium plan — this combines the usual Google One perks like 2TB of storage and 10 percent back in purchases from the Google Store with a bunch of AI tools.

articles.title: I Tried Pure Diffuser Vape—Here's What Happened to My Energy & Relaxation
articles.summary: Pure Diffuser Co. has launched Pure Diffuser Vape, a nicotine-free vaping alternative focused on aromatherapy and wellness. The product line includes diffusers targeting energy, relaxation, calmness, and vitality, with prices ranging from $20 to $70, and are available through the company's website.

articles.title: B&M shoppers 'need to try' £4 hydration drink 'just like' Prime
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: Lionel Messi's hydration drink, Mās+, is now available at B&M stores. The drink comes in flavors like Berry Copa Crush, Miami Punch, Orange D'Or and Limon Lime League and is priced at £4 for a 500ml bottle.

articles.title: Need pop, chips, coffee? Order convenience items via drive-thru at this Holland gas station
articles.author: Austin Metz
articles.summary: Quality Car Wash has launched a new drive-thru service at its Holland Township location, offering customers grab-and-go items such as chips, drinks, and candy. This service aims to provide convenience, especially for parents with children, allowing them to purchase items without leaving their vehicles.

articles.title: Dyson's new handheld vacuum is under $300
articles.author: Zoe Moore
articles.summary: Dyson has launched the Dyson Car+Boat handheld vacuum cleaner, described as its most powerful handheld vacuum yet, priced under $300. It features three attachments, weighs less than 5 pounds, and offers up to 40 minutes of run time. Dyson also released the New Dyson Airwrap i.d. multi-styler and dryer.

articles.title: Snapdragon's AI PC Revolution: How Qualcomm is Bringing Next-Gen Computing to India via Croma Stores
articles.author: Kahekashan
articles.summary: Qualcomm, in partnership with Croma, launched Snapdragon-powered AI PCs in India, marking a significant milestone with the opening of a retail experience zone in Mumbai. These AI PCs offer features like real-time translations and AI-assisted workflows, with Qualcomm aiming to educate consumers on their benefits and establish Snapdragon's credibility in the PC space.

articles.title: Qatar University launches first market event to promote entrepreneurial ecosystem
articles.author: Qna Doha
articles.summary: Qatar University launched the Qatar University Souq, a new platform for students and alumni to showcase and market their entrepreneurial products and services. The Souq provides a supportive environment for developing business ideas, establishing networks, and connecting with the public, while also featuring workshops to enhance marketing and startup management skills.

articles.title: GoDaddy Airo: An AI-Powered Revolutionary Solution for Asian Entrepreneurs and Small Business Owners
articles.author: PR Wire
articles.summary: GoDaddy has launched GoDaddy Airo®, an AI-powered experience designed to help small and medium-sized businesses establish an online presence quickly. GoDaddy Airo® offers features like instant website development, logo creation, automated Search Engine Optimization, and professional email services to simplify digital brand building and growth for entrepreneurs without technical expertise.

articles.title: What Andrew Ng says about AI Agents - CO/AI
articles.author: Anthony Batt
articles.summary: AI Agents are introduced as autonomous systems designed to understand natural language, learn from experience, and perform tasks for users. They function as intuitive interfaces, handling tasks ranging from simple to complex, with the potential to transform daily work and life by acting as intelligent personal assistants. These agents adapt to user needs and automate workflows, presenting a shift towards application-layer innovations.

articles.title: China Econ Frontier: Cixi, the small town that packs huge global impact in home appliances industry
articles.summary: Huayu Electrical Appliance Group developed a new, high-performance air fryer model with improved airflow design. The company was able to quickly scale production of this new air fryer due to the support of Cixi's industrial chain, which facilitated rapid development and optimization.

articles.title: Snapdragon X India Launch Live Streaming: Watch Online Telecast of Launch of Snapdragon X Series, AI PCs Solution
articles.author: Kalpeshkumar Patelia
articles.summary: Snapdragon is launching the Snapdragon X series processors and AI PC-related solutions at the Snapdragon X India Launch Event, which will be live-streamed today at 12:00 PM in India. The launch will showcase new experiences enabled by on-device AI with live demonstrations, highlighting the platform's potential to transform PCs.

articles.title: Wedding industry embraces AI
articles.summary: Hunliji, a Chinese wedding service platform, is introducing AI-powered tools to enhance wedding planning. These new services include virtual dress fittings, a magic mirror for instant photo editing which edits over 5 million photos daily, and a 24/7 AI sales assistant, aimed at providing unique and high-quality experiences for tech-savvy couples.

articles.title: Snapdragon X Platform Launch: Snapdragon Expected To Unveil AI PCs and X Series Processors Related Solutions Today in India
articles.author: Kalpeshkumar Patelia
articles.summary: Snapdragon announced the "Snapdragon X Platform Launch" event in India to unveil "AI PCs for Everything". The event will likely introduce Snapdragon X series processors and other AI-related products.

articles.title: This is one of the cheapest robot vacuums on Amazon right now - and we've tested it
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: Lubluelu has launched the SL68 robot vacuum cleaner. It is currently available on Amazon for a discounted price of £124.96, reduced from its retail price of £189.99 and It features LiDar navigation, 4,500pa suction power, automatic suction adjustment, and a combined dust and water tank for vacuuming and mopping.

articles.title: ‘Business is for anyone who wants to give it a go': How Leila Zadeh hopes sharing her story will inspire others
articles.author: Michael Crossland
articles.summary: Leila Zadeh launched Dordana in 2022, a premium lifestyle brand. Dordana's initial product line consists of traditionally-crafted glycerine soaps and plans to expand into a range of premium fragranced products. The soap is made by UK-based artisan soap makers using a 100-year-old family recipe.

articles.title: This is one of the cheapest robot vacuums on Amazon right now - and we've tested it
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: Lubluelu launched the SL68 robot vacuum cleaner, retailing at £189.99 but available for a limited time at £124.96 on Amazon. The Lubluelu SL68 features LiDar navigation, a combined dust and water tank for vacuuming and mopping, and adjustable suction power. The reviewer notes its solid performance, especially considering the price, making it a worthwhile option for budget-conscious consumers.

articles.title: KingSpec Honored as Newegg's '2025 Partner of the Year'
articles.author: Ltd.
org: Shenzhen KingSpec Electronics Technology Co., Ltd
articles.summary: KingSpec's XG7000 NVMe PCIe 4.0 SSD delivers ultra-fast read and write speeds, targeting gamers and high-performance users. The P3 Series 2.5 inch SATA SSD offers enhanced speed, durability, and efficiency for improved computing experiences. These products have gained popularity on Newegg.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge specs leaked, said to feature Snapdragon 8 Elite and 4,000mAh battery
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: Samsung's Galaxy S Edge is rumored to feature a Snapdragon Elite processor and a mAh battery. These specifications suggest an upcoming product launch or unveiling from Samsung.

articles.title: 2025 BYD Sealion 7 Revealed to Take On Top-Selling Tesla Model Y
articles.author: Somnath Chatterjee
articles.summary: BYD is launching the Sealion 7, an electric SUV, in Australia, with prices starting at AUD$54,990. The Sealion 7 comes in Premium and Performance variants, offering up to 482km range (WLTP) and competing with the Tesla Model Y. EVDirect, BYD's Australian distributor, has already received over 5,000 expressions of interest and expects the Sealion 7 to be their best-selling all-electric car.

articles.title: Thread by @TheAIPedia on Thread Reader App
articles.summary: Reviewnicely is launched as an AI-powered platform to manage customer feedback. PresentationsAI transforms ideas into presentations. BuzzClip is launched as an AI-powered TikTok content creation tool, while Seonly boosts online sales with AI. AI Comic Factory creates customized comic books, and Rely.io helps track service quality. Toneup is introduced as a personalized fitness tool, generating custom workout plans.

articles.title: Sgcarmart introduces Buysafe, a New Standard for Quality Pre-Owned Cars
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Sgcarmart has launched Buysafe, a new pre-owned vehicle certification program, to provide car buyers with greater confidence. The program includes detailed vehicle inspections, a 12-month warranty, and exclusive car ownership perks such as roadside assistance and bespoke financing.

articles.title: DT Next Tech: MiPhi's new storm 1100X is the ultimate high-speed SSD for gamers, professionals
articles.author: Ashwin Rajagopalan
articles.summary: MiPhi, a joint venture between Micromax Informatics and Phison Technology, has launched the MiPhi Storm 1100X External SSD, a storage device targeted at gamers, professionals, and content creators. The SSD boasts read speeds of 1100 MB/s and write speeds of 1000 MB/s, rugged build with 2-meter drop protection, and is available in a 1TB version with a 2TB version planned to launch soon.

articles.title: DT Tech Next: MiPhi's new storm 1100X is the ultimate high-speed SSD for gamers, professionals
articles.author: Ashwin Rajagopalan
articles.summary: MiPhi, a joint venture between Micromax Informatics and Phison Technology, has launched the MiPhi Storm 1100X External SSD, targeting gamers, professionals, and content creators. The SSD features read speeds of 1100 MB/s and write speeds of 1000 MB/s, 10Gbps high-speed transfers with backward compatibility, a rugged metal body with 2-meter drop protection, LDPC ECC error correction, and a built-in thermal sensor. The 1TB version is currently available, with a 2TB version expected to launch soon.

articles.title: Instagram Tests AI-Based Tasks via DMs
articles.author: Andrew Hutchinson
articles.summary: OpenAI recently launched its 'Operator' app, enabling web-based activities at user request. Meta is experimenting with a 'Create Task' prompt in Instagram DMs, allowing users to initiate actions based on message content. This feature is in early testing and represents a step towards expanding AI chatbots beyond text-based responses into task initiation.

articles.title: Looking Good At 90, Zabar's Is Still Serving New York
articles.author: Kristin L. Wolfe
articles.summary: Zabar's celebrated its 90th anniversary with a special coffee blend, in-house cafe specials, and pop-up events. The company is planning to expand with a stand-alone cafe and aims to bring bagel production in-house. They also collaborated with the MTA to cross-market their anniversaries.

articles.title: The Next Wave Of Retail Tech: 4 Problems These AI Startups Are Solving
articles.author: Kiri Masters
articles.summary: Several companies are launching new AI-powered platforms and solutions for the retail industry. Lily AI offers a Product Content Optimization platform, Vody enhances product discovery through multimodal AI, Nextail transforms inventory models, Cognitiwe introduces WeFresh for fresh food management, Quicklizard provides dynamic pricing automation, RevLifter personalizes promotions, Fashable generates AI-generated fashion imagery, and Rocketium automates creative content creation.

articles.title: Tesla Continues To Cut The Price Of Model Y In Inventory
articles.summary: Tesla is launching the new Model Y. The initial release is a fully-loaded All-Wheel Drive Launch edition, while a discounted prior-generation Model Y is available to clear inventory. Less expensive versions of the new Model Y are already available for order in Europe.

articles.title: Cheap WHMCS Alternative Domain and Hosting Order Software with Hosting Template only $15
articles.author: Web Hosting Talk
articles.summary: domainCart is introduced as an affordable PHP software alternative to WHMCS for domain and web hosting signup. It features an ajax domain checker with whois lookup, and allows users to add domains and hosting to the shopping cart from a single page, facilitating domain name sales and hosting package offerings.

articles.title: Asus' newest mouse smells weird (because it's full of scented oil)
articles.author: PC World
articles.summary: Asus announced the Asus Fragrance Mouse, a new PC mouse design. This mouse has scented oil inside it, making it fragrant.

articles.title: Marks and Spencer's 'elegant' �25 sweatshirt is perfect for chilly spring days
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: The Pure Cotton Zip Through Sweatshirt offers effortless style and comfort. It is made from pure cotton material.

articles.title: Claude AI is getting a major upgrade this week, but not the one we expected
articles.author: BGR
articles.summary: Anthropic is planning to introduce ChatGPT-like features, such as reasoning and internet search support, to its Claude AI model. These new capabilities aim to enhance Claude's performance by providing better assistance and up-to-date information.

articles.title: Galaxy S25 Edge specs leak teases an amazing ultra-thin phone
articles.author: BGR
articles.summary: Samsung launched the ultra-thin Galaxy S25 Edge at the Galaxy S25 Unpacked event. The Galaxy S25 Edge was briefly teased on stage and showcased during a hands-on experience, attracting attendees.

articles.title: Simon Teams with Shopify and Leap To Bring Brands To Its Centers
articles.author: Billboard
articles.summary: Simon, Shopify, and Leap are collaborating. This collaboration aims to help brands open stores, suggesting a new service or feature related to store creation or management for brands.

articles.title: Mercedes unveil F1 car for new era with Russell and Antonelli
articles.author: Straits Times
articles.summary: Mercedes launched their new W16 car through a digital event.

articles.title: Chrome's AI can block threats and swap bad passwords. Hooray?
articles.author: PC World
articles.summary: Google is integrating AI models into its Chrome browser. This includes a recent update to Google's Enhanced.

articles.title: Ncell's flash sale now in Khalti on Sundays, with prizes
articles.author: Kantipur Media Group
articles.summary: Ncell, in partnership with Khalti, has launched a Flash Sale offer, providing bonus resources and prizes for customers purchasing selected Ncell products via the Khalti app until March 23. Customers purchasing specific Sadhain ON packs, Home and Away packs, or the 999 Unlimited data pack through Khalti will receive bonus data or on-net talk time and the chance to win prizes. Additionally, Ncell continues its Flash Sale in the Ncell App on Saturdays, offering bonus resources and a 20% discount on Newmew products.
